biotools.summary: GNPS is a web-based mass spectrometry ecosystem that aims to be an open-access knowledge base for community-wide organization and sharing of raw, processed, or annotated fragmentation mass spectrometry data (MS/MS). GNPS aids in identification and discovery throughout the entire life cycle of data; from initial data acquisition/analysis to post publication.

bioschemas.name: GNPS
